Question: For given triangle, Find the perimeter of the triangle in terms of $n$
Solution_text:
--------------------------------------SOLUTION-------------------------------------------
Formula of Perimeter = Sum of all sides of triangle
Therefore Sum of All Sides = $71$ + $85$ + $n$
Perimeter = $156$ + $n$
ThereFore Option $1$ is right selection

--------------------------------------SOLUTION-------------------------------------------
Formula of Perimeter = Sum of all sides of triangle
